metadata.title: CVE-2018-16647 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In Artifex MuPDF 1.13.0, the pdf_get_xref_entry function in pdf/pdf-xref.callows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault infz_write_data in fitz/output.c) via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: mupdf package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
